Neighborhood Meal Plans

 


 
For Meal Plan customer service, please email diningplans@stanford.edu. For answers to the most common questions, review our Meal Plan FAQs.
 












My Account
Manage your meal plan options here. You can check your account balance and purchase a meal plan or Cardinal Dollars by logging in with your SUnetID here.
 













Undergrad Meal Plans
Undergrad students have different meal plan options. Learn more about the new neighborhood Dining Hall Meal Plans and The Row, Suites & Co-Op Meal Plans for the 2022-23 academic year!
 













Graduate Student Meal Plans
Enjoy fresh and delicious meals at any of our open dining halls starting at prices as low as $6.20.
 













Post-Doc & Grad Student Partner/Spouse
Meal Plans
Enjoy fresh and delicious meals at any of our open dining halls starting at prices as low as $6.20.
